final_jeopardy.answer: A Long Day's Journey into Night (by Eugene O'Neill)
final_jeopardy.clue: This drama is set at a summer home in August 1912; Act 1 takes place at 8:30 A.M.; Act 4 is 15 1/2 hours later, at midnight
